description: Make these overnight oats ahead of time. Packed with pear and cinnamon, they're creamy, crunchy and delicious.
keywords: Porridge,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Spring,Pear,Halal,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Sep 2020,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Pear Crumble Overnight Oats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats, milk and honey in a large airtight container or jar, mixing well to combine. Seal with lid. Refrigerate overnight to soak.

To make pear crumble topping, place butter, sugar, cinnamon and 1/4 cup water in a frying pan and cook, stirring, over medium heat for 2 minutes or until sugar has dissolved. Add pear and cook, basting frequently, for 3 minutes or until pear is tender and begins to caramelise.

Spoon 1 1/2 cups oat mixture into a bowl. To serve warm, microwave oat mixture, stirring halfway, on high for 1 minute 15 seconds or until warmed through. Spoon over pear crumble topping and serve sprinkled with granola.
